reviews.review_msg: Class is great but exams are HARD. Previous semesters were stricly SA exams, & though he's now added MC & T/F, I FAILED both the midterm & final. But.. I aced all 3 papers that totaled 50% of my mark & ended up with an A. How does that even work?! Do your very best on your papers & you won't have much pressure for the exams!!
